headline: Lifeward’s ReWalk™ Personal Exoskeleton Now Covered by Aetna, Coverage Expands to Include Three of the Largest Medicare Advantage Insurers
summary: Aetna joins Humana and United Healthcare in providing Medicare Advantage coverage for beneficiaries who meet medical necessity criteria for the ReWalk Personal Exoskeleton Together, these three national Medicare Advantage insurers represent approximately 16 million beneficiaries across the United States HUDSON, Mass. and YOKNEAM ILLIT, Israel, Feb. 17, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Lifeward Ltd.
